class.name: TextServer
class.brief_description: Interface for the fonts and complex text layouts.
class.description: [TextServer] is the API backend for managing fonts, and rendering complex text.

method.name: create_font_bitmap
method.description: Creates new, empty bitmap font. To free the resulting font, use [method free_rid] method.

method.name: create_font_memory
method.description: Creates new font from the data in memory. To free the resulting font, use [method free_rid] method. Note: For non-scalable fonts [code]base_size[/code] is ignored, use [method font_get_base_size] to check actual font size.

method.name: create_font_resource
method.description: Creates new font from the file. To free the resulting font, use [method free_rid] method. Note: For non-scalable fonts [code]base_size[/code] is ignored, use [method font_get_base_size] to check actual font size.

method.name: create_font_system
method.description: Creates new font from the system font. To free the resulting font, use [method free_rid] method. Note: This method is supported by servers with the [code]FEATURE_FONT_SYSTEM[/code] feature. Note: For non-scalable fonts [code]base_size[/code] is ignored, use [method font_get_base_size] to check actual font size.

method.name: create_shaped_text
method.description: Creates new buffer for complex text layout, with the given [code]direction[/code] and [code]orientation[/code]. To free the resulting buffer, use [method free_rid] method. Note: Direction is ignored if server does not support [code]FEATURE_BIDI_LAYOUT[/code] feature. Note: Orientation is ignored if server does not support [code]FEATURE_VERTICAL_LAYOUT[/code] feature.

method.name: draw_hex_code_box
method.description: Draws box displaying character hexadecimal code. Used for replacing missing characters.

method.name: font_add_to_cache
method.description: Adds new cache entry for specific variation and size. Use [method font_preload_range] to populate it with glpyhs. Note: New cache entry is created automaticaly when it's first accessed.

method.name: font_bitmap_add_char
method.description: Adds a character to the font, where [code]character[/code] is the Unicode value, [code]texture[/code] is the texture index, [code]rect[/code] is the region in the texture (in pixels!), [code]align[/code] is the (optional) alignment for the character and [code]advance[/code] is the (optional) advance.

method.name: font_bitmap_add_kerning_pair
method.description: Adds a kerning pair to the bitmap font as a difference. Kerning pairs are special cases where a typeface advance is determined by the next character.

method.name: font_bitmap_add_texture
method.description: Adds a texture to the bitmap font.

method.name: font_clear_cache
method.description: Removes all loaded font sizes and variations from cache.

method.name: font_draw_glyph
method.description: Draws single glyph into a canvas item at the position, using [code]font[/code] at the size [code]size[/code]. Note: Glyph index is specific to the font, use glyphs indices returned by [method shaped_text_get_glyphs] or [method font_get_glyph_index].

method.name: font_draw_glyph_outline
method.description: Draws single glyph outline of size [code]outline_size[/code] into a canvas item at the position, using [code]font[/code] at the size [code]size[/code]. Note: Glyph index is specific to the font, use glyphs indices returned by [method shaped_text_get_glyphs] or [method font_get_glyph_index].

method.name: font_get_antialiased
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if font 8-bit anitialiased glyph rendering is supported and enabled.

method.name: font_get_ascent
method.description: Returns the font ascent (number of pixels above the baseline).

method.name: font_get_base_size
method.description: Returns the default size of the font.

method.name: font_get_descent
method.description: Returns the font descent (number of pixels below the baseline).

method.name: font_get_disable_distance_field_shader
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if distance field rendering shader is disabled.

method.name: font_get_distance_field_hint
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code], if fonts supports and uses distance field rendering.

method.name: font_get_feature_list
method.description: Returns list of OpenType features supported by font.

method.name: font_get_force_autohinter
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if auto-hinting is supported and preffered over font built-in hinting.

method.name: font_get_global_oversampling
method.description: Returns the font oversampling factor, shared by all fonts in the TextServer.

method.name: font_get_glyph_advance
method.description: Returns advance of the glyph.

method.name: font_get_glyph_contours
method.description: Returns outline contours of the glyph in a Dictionary. [code]points[/code] - [PackedVector3Array], containing outline points. [code]x[/code] and [code]y[/code] are point coordinates. [code]z[/code] is the type of the point, using the [enum ContourPointTag] values. [code]contours[/code] - [PackedInt32Array], containing indices the end points of each contour. [code]orientation[/code] - [bool], contour orientation. If [code]true[/code], clockwise contours must be filled.

method.name: font_get_glyph_index
method.description: Returns the glyph index of a [code]char[/code], optionally modified by the [code]variation_selector[/code].

method.name: font_get_glyph_kerning
method.description: Returns a kerning of the pair of glyphs.

method.name: font_get_glyph_size
method.description: Returns size of a glyph in pixels.

method.name: font_get_height
method.description: Returns the total font height (ascent plus descent) in pixels.

method.name: font_get_hinting
method.description: Returns the font hinting mode.

method.name: font_get_language_support_override
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if support override is enabled for the [code]language[/code].

method.name: font_get_language_support_overrides
method.description: Returns list of language support overrides.

method.name: font_get_msdf_px_range
method.description: Return the width of the range around the shape between the minimum and maximum representable signed distance.

method.name: font_get_oversampling
method.description: Returns the font oversampling factor.

method.name: font_get_script_support_override
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if support override is enabled for the [code]script[/code].

method.name: font_get_script_support_overrides
method.description: Returns list of script support overrides.

method.name: font_get_spacing_glyph
method.description: Returns extra spacing for each glyph in pixels.

method.name: font_get_spacing_space
method.description: Sets extra spacing for each glyph in pixels.

method.name: font_get_supported_chars
method.description: Returns a string containing all the characters available in the font.

method.name: font_get_underline_position
method.description: Returns underline offset (number of pixels below the baseline).

method.name: font_get_underline_thickness
method.description: Returns underline thickness in pixels.

method.name: font_get_variation
method.description: Returns variation coordinate [code]tag[/code].

method.name: font_get_variation_list
method.description: Returns list of supported [url=https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/dvaraxisreg]variation coordinates[/url], each coordinate is returned as [code]tag: Vector3i(min_value,max_value,default_value)[/code]. Font variations allow for continuous change of glyph characteristics along some given design axis, such as weight, width or slant.

method.name: font_has_char
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if [code]char[/code] is available in the font.

method.name: font_has_outline
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code], if font supports glyph outlines.

method.name: font_is_language_supported
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code], if font supports given language (ISO 639 code).

method.name: font_is_script_supported
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code], if font supports given script (ISO 15924 code).

method.name: font_preload_range
method.description: Pre-renders character or glyph in range for all font sizes and variations in the cahce.

method.name: font_remove_language_support_override
method.description: Remove language support override.

method.name: font_remove_script_support_override
method.description: Removes script support override.

method.name: font_save_cache
method.description: Saves rendered glyph textures, properties and font source data to file.

method.name: font_set_antialiased
method.description: If set to [code]true[/code], 8-bit antialiased glyph rendering is used, otherwise 1-bit rendering is used.

method.name: font_set_disable_distance_field_shader
method.description: If set to [code]true[/code], disables distance field rendering shader and renders raw MSDF RGBA values instead.

method.name: font_set_distance_field_hint
method.description: Sets font distance field hint.

method.name: font_set_force_autohinter
method.description: If set to [code]true[/code] auto-hinting is preffered over font built-in hinting.

method.name: font_set_global_oversampling
method.description: Sets oversampling factor, shared by all font in the TextServer. Note: This value can be automaticaly changed by display server.

method.name: font_set_hinting
method.description: Sets font hinting mode.

method.name: font_set_language_support_override
method.description: Adds override for [method font_is_language_supported].

method.name: font_set_msdf_px_range
method.description: Sets the width of the range around the shape between the minimum and maximum representable signed distance.

method.name: font_set_oversampling
method.description: Sets oversampling factor, if set to [code]0.0[/code] global oversampling factor is used instead.

method.name: font_set_script_support_override
method.description: Adds override for [method font_is_script_supported].

method.name: font_set_spacing_glyph
method.description: Returns extra spacing for the space character in pixels.

method.name: font_set_spacing_space
method.description: Sets extra spacing for the space character in pixels.

method.name: font_set_variation
method.description: Sets variation coordinate [code]name[/code]. Unsupported coordinates will be silently ignored.

method.name: format_number
method.description: Converts a number from the Western Arabic (0..9) to the numeral systems used in [code]language[/code].

method.name: free_rid
method.description: Frees an object created by this [TextServer].

method.name: get_hex_code_box_size
method.description: Returns size of the replacement character (box with character hexadecimal code that is drawn in place of invalid characters).

method.name: get_name
method.description: Returns the name of the server interface.

method.name: get_system_fonts
method.description: Returns list of available system fonts. Note: This method is supported by servers with the [code]FEATURE_FONT_SYSTEM[/code] feature.

method.name: has
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if [code]rid[/code] is valid resource owned by this text server.

method.name: has_feature
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the server supports a feature.

method.name: is_locale_right_to_left
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if locale is right-to-left.

method.name: load_support_data
method.description: Loads optional TextServer database (e.g. ICU break iterators and dictionaries). Note: This function should be called before any other TextServer functions used, otherwise it won't have any effect.

method.name: name_to_tag
method.description: Converts readable feature, variation, script or language name to OpenType tag.

method.name: parse_number
method.description: Converts a number from the numeral systems used in [code]language[/code] to Western Arabic (0..9).

method.name: percent_sign
method.description: Returns percent sign used in the [code]language[/code].

method.name: shaped_text_add_object
method.description: Adds inline object to the text buffer, [code]key[/code] must be unique. In the text, object is represented as [code]length[/code] object replacement characters.

method.name: shaped_text_add_string
method.description: Adds text span and font to draw it to the text buffer.

method.name: shaped_text_clear
method.description: Clears text buffer (removes text and inline objects).

method.name: shaped_text_draw
method.description: Draw shaped text into a canvas item at a given position, with [code]color[/code]. [code]pos[/code] specifies the leftmost point of the baseline (for horizontal layout) or topmost point of the baseline (for vertical layout).

method.name: shaped_text_draw_outline
method.description: Draw the outline of the shaped text into a canvas item at a given position, with [code]color[/code]. [code]pos[/code] specifies the leftmost point of the baseline (for horizontal layout) or topmost point of the baseline (for vertical layout).

method.name: shaped_text_fit_to_width
method.description: Adjusts text with to fit to specified width, returns new text width.

method.name: shaped_text_get_ascent
method.description: Returns the text ascent (number of pixels above the baseline for horizontal layout or to the left of baseline for vertical). Note: overall ascent can be higher than font ascent, if some glyphs are displaced from the baseline.

method.name: shaped_text_get_carets
method.description: Returns shapes of the carets corresponding to the character offset [code]position[/code] in the text. Returned caret shape is 1 pixel wide rectangle.

method.name: shaped_text_get_descent
method.description: Returns the text descent (number of pixels below the baseline for horizontal layout or to the right of baseline for vertical). Note: overall descent can be higher than font descent, if some glyphs are displaced from the baseline.

method.name: shaped_text_get_direction
method.description: Returns direction of the text.

method.name: shaped_text_get_dominant_direciton_in_range
method.description: Returns dominant direction of in the range of text.

method.name: shaped_text_get_glyphs
method.description: Returns text glyphs.

method.name: shaped_text_get_line_breaks
method.description: Breaks text to the lines and returns character ranges for each line.

method.name: shaped_text_get_line_breaks_adv
method.description: Breaks text to the lines and columns. Returns character ranges for each segment.

method.name: shaped_text_get_object_rect
method.description: Returns bounding rectangle of the inline object.

method.name: shaped_text_get_objects
method.description: Returns array of inline objects.

method.name: shaped_text_get_orientation
method.description: Returns text orientation.

method.name: shaped_text_get_parent
method.description: Sets text orientation.

method.name: shaped_text_get_preserve_control
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if text buffer is configured to display control characters.

method.name: shaped_text_get_preserve_invalid
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if text buffer is configured to display hexadecimal codes in place of invalid characters. Note: If set to [code]false[/code], nothing is displayed in place of invalid characters.

method.name: shaped_text_get_range
method.description: Returns substring buffer character range in the parent buffer.

method.name: shaped_text_get_selection
method.description: Returns selection rectangles for the specified character range.

method.name: shaped_text_get_size
method.description: Returns size of the text.

method.name: shaped_text_get_underline_position
method.description: Returns pixel offset of the underline below the baseline.

method.name: shaped_text_get_underline_thickness
method.description: Returns thickness of the underline.

method.name: shaped_text_get_width
method.description: Returns width (for horizontal layout) or height (for vertical) of the text.

method.name: shaped_text_get_word_breaks
method.description: Breaks text into words and returns array of character ranges.

method.name: shaped_text_hit_test_grapheme
method.description: Returns grapheme index at the specified pixel offset at the baseline, or [code]-1[/code] if none is found.

method.name: shaped_text_hit_test_position
method.description: Returns caret character offset at the specified pixel offset at the baseline. This function always returns a valid position.

method.name: shaped_text_is_ready
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if buffer is successfully shaped.

method.name: shaped_text_next_grapheme_pos
method.description: Returns composite character end position closest to the [code]pos[/code].

method.name: shaped_text_prev_grapheme_pos
method.description: Returns composite character start position closest to the [code]pos[/code].

method.name: shaped_text_resize_object
method.description: Sets new size and alignment of embedded object.

method.name: shaped_text_set_bidi_override
method.description: Overrides BiDi for the structured text. Override ranges should cover full source text without overlaps. BiDi algorithm will be used on each range separately.

method.name: shaped_text_set_direction
method.description: Sets desired text direction. If set to [code]TEXT_DIRECTION_AUTO[/code], direction will be detected based on the buffer contents and current locale. Note: Direction is ignored if server does not support [code]FEATURE_BIDI_LAYOUT[/code] feature.

method.name: shaped_text_set_orientation
method.description: Sets desired text orientation. Note: Orientation is ignored if server does not support [code]FEATURE_VERTICAL_LAYOUT[/code] feature.

method.name: shaped_text_set_preserve_control
method.description: If set to [code]true[/code] text buffer will display control characters.

method.name: shaped_text_set_preserve_invalid
method.description: If set to [code]true[/code] text buffer will display invalid characters as hexadecimal codes, otherwise nothing is displayed.

method.name: shaped_text_shape
method.description: Shapes buffer if it's not shaped. Returns [code]true[/code] if the string is shaped successfully. Note: It is not necessary to call this function manually, buffer will be shaped automatically as soon as any of its output data is requested.

method.name: shaped_text_substr
method.description: Returns text buffer for the substring of the text in the [code]shaped[/code] text buffer (including inline objects).

method.name: shaped_text_tab_align
method.description: Aligns shaped text to the given tab-stops.

method.name: tag_to_name
method.description: Converts OpenType tag to readable feature, variation, script or language name.

constants.constant: Text direction is determined based on contents and current locale.
Text is written from left to right.
Text is written from right to left.
Text is written horizontally.
Left to right text is written vertically from top to bottom. Right to left text is written vertically from bottom to top.
Do not justify text.
Justify text by adding and removing kashidas.
Justify text by changing width of the spaces between the words.
Remove trailing and leading spaces from the justified text.
Only apply justification to the part of the text after the last tab.
Do not break the line.
Break the line at the line mandatory break characters (e.g. [code]"\n"[/code]).
Break the line between the words.
Break the line between any unconnected graphemes.
Grapheme is part of right-to-left or bottom-to-top run.
Grapheme is not part of source text, it was added by justification process.
Grapheme is whitespace.
Grapheme is mandatory break point (e.g. [code]"\n"[/code]).
Grapheme is optional break point (e.g. space).
Grapheme is the tabulation character.
Grapheme is kashida.
Grapheme is punctuation character.
Disables font hinting (smoother but less crisp).
Use the light font hinting mode.
Use the default font hinting mode (crisper but less smooth).
TextServer supports bidirectional layouts.
TextServer supports vertical layouts.
TextServer supports complex text shaping.
TextServer supports justification using kashidas.
TextServer supports complex line/word breaking rules (e.g. dictionary based).
TextServer supports loading system fonts.
TextServer supports variable fonts.
TextServer require external data file for some features.
Contour point is on the curve.
Contour point isn't on the curve, but serves as a control point for a conic (quadratic) Bézier arc.
Contour point isn't on the curve, but serves as a control point for a cubic Bézier arc.
Pre-loaded textures are saved as separate files.
Converts pre-loaded dynamic font to bitmap font.
